entry.title: David Levy: removed item to improve main page balance
entry.summary:
removed item to improve main page balance

← Previous revision Revision as of 07:08, 23 March 2013
Line 10: Line 10:
 
{{*mp|March 20}} [[President of Bangladesh|Bangladeshi President]] '''[[Zillur Rahman]]''' dies in a Singapore hospital at the age of 84.
  
{{*mp|March 20}} [[President of Bangladesh|Bangladeshi President]] '''[[Zillur Rahman]]''' dies in a Singapore hospital at the age of 84.
 
{{*mp|March 18}} '''[[Bosco Ntaganda]]''', leader of the [[M23 (militia)|March 23 Movement]], surrenders himself to the U.S. embassy in Rwanda in response to an [[International Criminal Court]] indictment on war crimes.
  
{{*mp|March 18}} '''[[Bosco Ntaganda]]''', leader of the [[M23 (militia)|March 23 Movement]], surrenders himself to the U.S. embassy in Rwanda in response to an [[International Criminal Court]] indictment on war crimes.
−
{{*mp|March 17}} In [[alpine skiing]], [[Tina Maze]] and [[Marcel Hirscher]] win the overall women's and men's '''[[2013 Alpine Skiing World Cup|World Cup]]''' titles, respectively.
  
 
{{*mp|March 17}} Japanese architect '''[[Toyo Ito]]''' wins the [[Pritzker Architecture Prize|Pritzker Prize]].
  
{{*mp|March 17}} Japanese architect '''[[Toyo Ito]]''' wins the [[Pritzker Architecture Prize|Pritzker Prize]].
